text:
NAEB NETWORK
3.4 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
TO. RADIO NETWORK COMMITTEE*
Lee SÂ» Dreyfus, WDET
Hugh Mix, WNAD
John Regnell, WILL
Edward J. Slack, KUSD
Richard Vogl, WOI
Waldo Abbot, WUOM
FROMi NETWORK MANAGER
RE: NEW NETWORK POLICIES
Gentlemen:
Attached please find a page of new policies which will be sent to the Network
membership. However, before issuing these policy decisions, we thought you
might like to have a look at them and, if you wish, comment on them*
Since we wish to distribute these policy statements as soon as possible, will
you please respond to this by November 26? We will assume silence to mean
assent, so let us hear from you.
11/15/56
arp
